site_name: Development Site At Godwin House, Tollgate House And Wingfield House
description: Variation of Condition 18 (waste) of planning permission dated 08.05.2017 (RN: 16/06647/FULL) for Variation of Condition 1 (approved plans) of planning permission dated 28 May 2014 (RN: 13/05695/COFUL) for demolition of Godwin and Wingfield Houses and ancillary garages in connection with the Estate Regeneration to provide 248 residential units within five new buildings of between 2-9 storeys and the retention of Tollgate House with associated external alterations, construction of a new single storey community centre and associated car parking, landscaping and open space. (Councils Own Development); Namely amendments to lower ground and ground floor plans and of two flats of Tollgate House, reduction in height of walkway glazing from 1.8m to 1.1m, external gas meter room and rise to Tollgate House; omission of two windows internal alterations to flats to new buildings to provide en-suites to 23 private flats. NAMELY, to allow amendments to the community centre refuse.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
Hrs bldg wks resi amenity adj occ
